Base Racial Speed Information

For most races the distance you can move per turn is 9m. Gnomes, Dwarves, Halflings and the subraces for these move 7.5 m per turn. Wood Elves and Wood Half-Elves move 10.5 m per turn.

How to unlock Base Racial Speed

Base Racial Speed can be acquired by: Any Race
